thread.title: Story behind teen's wonderful selfie with elderly woman goes viral
thread.title_full: Story behind teen's wonderful selfie with elderly woman goes viral

author: Mark Molloy
title: Story behind teen's wonderful selfie with elderly woman goes viral
text:
T he heartwarming story behind a Canadian teenager’s selfie with an elderly woman she met in a casino bathroom has touched internet hearts.
Mahri Smith , from Ottawa, was taking some selfies with her friends when the woman explained how much she missed dressing up to go out with her friends when she was younger.
T he 18-year-old posted the photos and the story behind them on social media, with more than 300,000 people liking and sharing the post.
“This lady in the washroom looking at me said, ‘I remember when my girlfriends and I would get dressed up and go out, I miss that’,” she wrote.
“So I said, ‘Why miss it, we are all out right now aren’t we? Short story, we have a new friend.”
And the photos went viral 💕 pic.twitter.com/LbzQZQRreM 
— mahrmaid (@SmithMahri) January 29, 2017 Apparently this is a cute picture 🙄💕 
A photo posted by mahriana (@smith_mahri) on Jan 30, 2017 at 12:02pm PST 
this is the cutest thing i've seen all day pic.twitter.com/RCC9XGHFdt 
— Relatable Quotes (@RelatableQuote) January 30, 2017 @SmithMahri pic.twitter.com/tSKIGEXLtc 
— 🥀 (@codeofsiIence) January 29, 2017 S ocial media users were touched by the selfie story, with one posting: “This made my whole damn weekend. Seriously. You probably made her day so much better.”
Another added: “The world needs more people like you.”
In an interview with CTV News Ottawa , Ms Smith added: “I told her ‘we’re all here- you are our girlfriend’. So she came in for the pictures and she was more photogenic than us, she was loving it, and it was just so much fun.”
“I just saw the picture and it made me smile, and I was thinking ‘oh my girlfriends will love this’.”
Her friend Morgan Sheppard added: “It would be really nice to track this lady down and get to know her, and let her know, ‘look you’re internet famous now’.”
L ast year, this teenager's kind act for a scared elderly woman also won internet hearts. 
Here's the amazing moment these newlyweds stopped to help a homeless man on their wedding day.
